forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then sunshine for the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then sunshine for the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain late. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain late. Low 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the morning. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Then remaining cloudy. High 59F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low near 45F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 13C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High near 55F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 6C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 43F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 14C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 58F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 16C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 61F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 11C. Winds ESE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 51F. Winds ESE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 15C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 58F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High around 15C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 59F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny in the morning. Increasing clouds with showers later in the day. High 16C. SSE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later in the day. High around 60F. SSE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High around 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High around 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 60F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
